thread.title: Ann R
thread.title_full: Smart Start, Inc. reviewed by Ann R

author: Ann R
title: Ann R
text: I just got my device last week and wasn't blowing properly the first day, so I had a violation. I didn't read the instructions correctly, so ended up with a lockout violation while traveling in a different state. I called Smart Start and Dorthia was SO nice and So helpful and patient! She told me what to do, gave me names & numbers close by and made me feel so much better!!
